com.tlswe.awsmock.ec2.control

Class MockEC2QueryHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tlswe.awsmock.ec2.control.MockEC2QueryHandler

  • public final class MockEC2QueryHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handlers requests of AWS Query API for managing mock ec2 instances. This class works between MockEc2Controller and MockEc2EndpointServlet.
    All object of mock ec2 instances are of the same type which is defined as property of "ec2.instance.class" in aws-mock.properties (or if not overridden, as the default value defined in aws-mock-default.properties).
    See Also:
    MockEc2Controller, MockEc2EndpointServlet

      • handle

        public void handle(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> queryParams,
          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Hub method for parsing query prarmeters and generate and write xml response.
        Parameters:
        queryParams - map of query parameters from http request, which is from standard AWS Query API
        response - http servlet response to handle with
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of failure of getting response's writer
